rows.translation: In the name of Allah, Most Gracious, Most Merciful.
When the earth is shaken to her (utmost) convulsion,
And the earth throws up her burdens (from within),
And man cries (distressed): 'What is the matter with her?'-
On that Day will she declare her tidings:
For that thy Lord will have given her inspiration.

rows.arabic: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَصْدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًا لِّيُرَوْا۟ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ
rows.translation: On that Day will men proceed in companies sorted out, to be shown the deeds that they (had done).
rows.transliteration: yawma-idhiy yaṣdurun nāsu ashtātal liyuraw a`mālahum

rows.arabic: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُۥ
rows.translation: Then shall anyone who has done an atom's weight of good, see it!
rows.transliteration: faman ya`mal mithqāla dharratin khayran yarah

rows.arabic: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُۥ
rows.translation: And anyone who has done an atom's weight of evil, shall see it.
rows.transliteration: wa man ya`mal mithqāla dharratin sharran yarah
